thread.section_title: Kohl's Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kohl's | www.kohls.com
thread.title: Todd

author: Todd
title: Todd
text: They said they were using UPS NOT USPS to deliver my package. Their tracking availability was non existent. Even entering the tracking number on the UPS site showed no information or updates. It took 1 week to get my order to my town, I ordered an outerwear jacket, they then transferred the order to USPS for final delivery. Huh! Didn't know a transfer like that could be made... Nevertheless, the order took way too long with no supporting tracking information to provide comfort on delivery. Horrible experience!!
